evidence.text: Petitioners and members of the provisionally certified class shall not be transferred outside the District of Colorado.

extracted.value: Petitioners and members of the provisionally certified class shall not be transferred outside the District of Colorado.

evidence.text: Respondents shall provide a twenty-one (21) day notice to individuals detained pursuant to the Act and Proclamation.

extracted.value: Respondents shall provide a twenty-one (21) day notice to individuals detained pursuant to the Act and Proclamation.

evidence.text: The Court also instructed Petitioners to file their preliminary injunction motion by April 25, 2025.

extracted.value: The Court instructed Petitioners to file their preliminary injunction motion by April 25, 2025.

evidence.text: It must also provide notice of a right to seek judicial review, and inform individuals they may consult an attorney regarding their detainment and the government's intent to remove.

extracted.value: Notice must also provide notice of a right to seek judicial review, and inform individuals they may consult an attorney regarding their detainment and the government's intent to remove.
